On 17 Mar 2007, at 14:34, Benjamin Carlyle wrote:
>  I think Stu is right that this is the old object/relational battle
> all over again and that it depends on your perspective as to which is
> important. I guess I am on the object side of the fence.

? OO languages are just dealing with graphs of objects. There is not  
side of the fence to sit on here.
They are pretty isomorphic.

Henry
